page.title: 03Farming Machinery
page.content: Mortgrove and Barton Hill are farmed by brothers. They share all their machinery including{14 tractors.}They have{3 cultivators}for loosening the soil ready for ploughing and one huge machine for spraying oil seed rape. The cab is high in the air. To get in you tread on the gigantic wheel and then jump up. Beneath the cab and between the wheels is a six foot high space so that the machine can pass over the rape which grows as high as the farmer. Farmers have constant trouble with{weeds}in their other crops. They control these by{spraying with special sprays. Peas have waxy leaves which makes water run off so a spray is used which drips off their leaves but clings to weeds and kills them.{Combine harvesters}are used to cut{cereal crops}in August and September.
